translations: n.（固定在墙上的）托架，支架；（收入、年龄等的）等级段，组级；括号；夹叉射击
v.把……置于括弧内，用括弧括；置于……两侧 ；把……归为一类，把……相提并论

phrs.translation: 钢支架，钢角码；钢制肘板

sentences.sentence: Each bracket is fixed to the wall with just three screws.
sentences.translation: 每个托架只用3颗螺钉固定在墙上。

sentences.sentence: Most of the houses are out of our price bracket.
sentences.translation: 大多数房子都超出我们的价格范围。

sentences.sentence: It is unfair to bracket together those who cannot work with those who will not.
sentences.translation: 把不能工作的人和不愿工作的人等同看待是不公平的。
